title: Services
subtitle: What can I do for you?
text: You have short term needs on the development strategy of an MVP, on the scale of your organization or on the processes to set up to maximize the delivery? I will be happy to help you.

service1.title: MVP strategy
service1.text: What functionality should be prioritized? How to minimize the time-to-market?

service2.title: Technical architecture
service2.text: How to design your next killer feature? What tools to use and what architecture to implement?

service3.title: Team organization
service3.text: How to manage the delivery and maximize the velocity of your teams?

service4.title: Audit
service4.text: How to improve your existing organization, tech and/or product?

service5.title: Coaching
service5.text: How to support your teams over the long term and help them progress?
